name: Universal Stainless & Alloy Products, Inc.
description: Universal Stainless & Alloy Products, Inc. is a leading manufacturer of semi-finished and finished specialty steel products, primarily for the aerospace, energy, and industrial markets. Founded in 1994 and headquartered in Bridgeville, Pennsylvania, the company operates several facilities across the United States, employing advanced technologies and processes to produce high-quality steel products. Universal Stainless focuses on producing a wide range of products, including stainless steel, nickel-based alloys, and titanium, catering to the needs of various industries including aerospace, military, and energy sectors. The company is committed to maintaining high standards of quality and service, ensuring that its products meet the rigorous demands of its customers. With a strong emphasis on innovation, Universal Stainless invests in modern manufacturing techniques and equipment to enhance productivity and efficiency. The company is dedicated to sustainability and actively works to reduce its environmental impact through responsible manufacturing practices. Universal Stainless aims to expand its market presence while continuing to deliver exceptional value to its customers through its diverse product offerings and specialized services.
